sub_title: Senior Principal Expert at Ordina C&C at Ordina
summary:
I have a T-shaped profile, with strong technical skills. I have extensive background in several key areas, and combine management skills with in-depth knowledge and technical expertise. I have strong communication skills, and am a creative thinker with an unorthodox approach.

I can combine facts extremely fast into a coherent picture. I maintain very high quality standards; for myself, my work, but also for my co-workers.  I work best in an innovative environment, surrounded by other quick thinkers. I am very driven, and I always - always - deliver. 

Be warned that I have a wicked sense of humor; I firmly believe that good team spirits help delivering the results needed.

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

projects.title: Digistream rollout
projects.description:
Working as network manager for KPN, in a strategic project to implement a national, fully managed, high-availability leased-line network.

My tasks were:
- Implementation of a nationwide managementnetwork for High-Quality Fixed Lines (Digistream)
- Adding new Network Hubs (Technical/Administrative)
- Remote Diagnosis of network problems using Spectrum
- Directing Telecom-district and mechanics to solve problems
- Escalation of high-priority problems
- Analysis, evaluation and reporting about implementation fase
- Second-line client support and problem solving

contributors.headline: Senior Principal Expert at Ordina C&C at Ordina

profile_positions.title: Senior Principal Expert at Ordina C&C

profile_positions.description:
To provide room for new business models within Ordina, a new business initiative was formed, namely the Ordina Innovation Cluster. Business Units that where deemed to have a huge growth potential have been transfered to this Cluster. I was asked to take a leading role within the unit Security & Risk Management.

Tasks include restructuring the business unit and redefining the business model. Definition of the themes and overall solutions. Portfoliomanagement and generating new business. 

Responsible for the Information Directed Operations (IGO) theme, adressing Control Rooms, Video Management/Video Analytics, and Intelligence. Demonstrations of advanced Video Analytics for Ordina Open Innovation days, Police Innovation Event, and Police Academy.
profile_positions.title: Principal Expert and MT member

profile_positions.description:
Helping to build a Strategic Business Development unit, focussing on long-term result-driven commitments, developing strategic opportunities, and portfolio development/enablement.

Perform Pre-sales activities and implement strategic partnerships for various clients. Maintain partnerships with strategic vendors. Product presentations at various seminars, focussing on the Safety & Security market. Develop solutions for complex problems at various client sites. Facilitate workshops for clients as part of an innovation initiative. Design and write large parts of various strategic proposals. Identify business opportunities and run projects and PoCs, trying new business or delivery models. Consult with clients, define and select the right solution, and recruit delivery partners to build the various parts of the solution. 

Other activities are:
- Facilitate Bootcamp for the Ordina Innovation Challenge 2015
- Working on opportunities for KMAR, RWS, UWV, National Police, Local Government, ING, Santander, MDC, IND/COA, ING
- Organise Hackaton for Day of Safety Region 2015
- Participate in Coalition of the Willing for the Safety Regions
- Seminars: CCR Summit, Purple Nectar, Day of the Safety Region, Open Innovation Day, G4 CIO Congress, Mobile Data 
- Develop business Solutions: IGO and Temporary Maintenance for Emergency Center, Landmine disassembly solution, IOT
profile_positions.title: Strategic Solution Manager / Special Sales

profile_positions.description:
Working for Strategic Business Development. Developing a presales process for strategic opportunities, Deal Shaping, preparing Delivery for complex solutions. Working with partners on delivery strategy. 

In a proposal team, manage the team and the story line, advise contract director, perform risk assessments, advise about strategy, and coordinate with partners and the internal Delivery Organisation. Participate in PoC's. Trouble shooting Delivery Projects. Design Solution Development methodology. Training/coaching Proposal writers and solution managers.

Working on opportunities for European Patent Office, UWV, National Police, Ministrery of V&J, Defense. Organise Bitcoin/blockchain events at Ordina for clients and partners. Participate in Innovation Events.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Solution Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working for the Centre of Excellence as a Solution Manager/Team leader. The focus of the CoE was to compose solutions based on standardized components, as well as the actual definition of the components themselves. This encompassed the entire scope of the Ordina organisation and requires highly skilled and motivated professionals with a broad view. This happend mostly in the form of proposals or pre-sales requests. In a proposal team, manage the team and the story line, advise contract director, perform risk assessments, advise about strategy, and coordinate with partners and the internal Delivery Organisation.

In addition to a function as Solution Manager, I was also managing all capacity requests (service management request) for Solution Managers, matching Solution Managers to specific requests, design and implement process improvements, and help the internal organisation with solution design.

Activities:
- Intake on proposal requests 
- Dispatching proposals among Solution Managers
- Implement improvement programs for Solution Management
- Assess/guard quality of Solution Management in proposals
- Coordinate with bidmanagement and Sales
- Prevent and solve escalations
- Implement a professional Solution Management proces
- Selecting/hiring Solution Managers
- Working on proposals for Openbaar Ministerie, ICTU, Belastingdienst, Amsterdam, Alliander, Dictu, Europol, Raad voor Rechtsbijstand, RWS and others
profile_positions.title: Solution Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working for the Management & Consultancy Unit as Management Consultant and Information Architect. Organisation of a large SOA Symposium (450+ participants). For various clients, commercial proposals and framework agreements had to be developed. Develop an Open Source Strategy, and organize an Open Source Business Unit. Write vision documents and white papers for internal and external use. Promotion of Ordina as speaker/presenter on various occasions. Presenting solutions and projects for clients.

Activities:
- Working on proposals for Ministery of OCW, Amsterdam, ICTU and USG People 
- Developing methodology, project plan and project approach
- Designing information architecture
- Developing various vision Documents 
- Desiging and implementing a Project Approach
- Writing and editing Commercial Proposals and Framework Agreements
- Creating and giving Client Presentations
- Formulating a strategy for Open Source & Open Standards
profile_positions.title: Consultant, Information Architect

profile_positions.description:
I assist the Dutch Ministry of Defense in a classified selection/acquisition project. I am responsible for the technical assessments of COTS solutions for this project, and assess the fit to the clients needs, 

Using my network I select and introduce possible partners for the pre-selection phase, and match their abilities against the proces requirements.
profile_positions.title: Architect/Advisor

profile_positions.description:
A large Retailler needed more insight in their Telecom Contracts and Processes

Activities:
- Analysing and Documenting current order/invoice processes
- Analysing and Documenting technical invoice datastreams
- Documenting dependencies and interfaces
- Advising about new workprocesses, including implementing a new strategic partnership
- Negotiating with Telecom Suppliers
- Defining needed management reports
- Solving historical disputes and backlogs
- Mapping the entire existing Telecom portfolio
- Identification and Implementation of Cost Savings
- Formulating new Telecom Policies
- Implementing the new Invoice and Order Process
profile_positions.title: Proces Architect

profile_positions.description:
A fusion between 3 Lease Companies resulted in a large migration program, including huge modification on existing application and business processes.

Activities:
- Management Progress Reports
- Principal consultant for Functional/Technical Designers, developers and business
- Process Supervisor
- Development of Requirement Documents & Impact Analyses
- Development of Functional Design Documents
- Documenting the entire Invoice Process, including supplying systems and processes
- Redesign of the Invoice Process and Subsystem
- Analysing and solving differences in General Ledger
- Creating and implementing Management Reports
- Managing project team during build/test fase
- Coordination and analyses of complex and urgent incidents
- Coordination of test activities
profile_positions.title: Information Analist, Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Development of a client-based calculation system, mimicking the existing server-based calculation system. In a short time, a web-based system had to be designed and developed based on an existing calculation library written on a different architecture.

- Managing the projectteam
- Development of the projectplan and global planning
- Controlling planning and progress
- Negotiating Change Requests, including Impact and Financial Analyses
- Directing the testmanager
- Progress reports
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Development of an internal, new Competence Center Architecture. Improving as existing toolkit (Quickscan) for ITIL effectiveness. Implement the quickscan for customers.

Activities:
- Development of a Business Plan for implementation of a Competence Center Architecture. 
- Development of a concept for System Management Architecture
- Redesigning management advisory toolkit for Measuring ITIL effectiveness
- Implementation of the ITIL Measurement Toolkit for customers
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Working as a Project Manager, Quality Manager, Program Manager or Information Architect for various clients at the clients site. Working independent but in a client team.Only working on big, strategic and time critical projects for clients:  Cadans (Relan/Detam) and KPN. 

Match4 merged with several other companies to form Solidium.
profile_positions.title: Architect

profile_positions.description:
A large Euro Program for conversion of all services, data and applications (100+).

- Writing the Project Plan, Realisation Plan, Resultarea Plan, Migration Plan, Test Vision Plan, Application/Service Chain Test Vision Plan
- Conceptual interpretation of IT strategie
- Developing Euro Business Strategie
- Projectmanagement of Products & Services Project
- Managing creation of section/division Project Plans
- Directing Section Project Leaders & Testmanagers
- Presentations for Employees, Management and Board
- Internal Publications
- Coordination of Audits
- Managing switch- and adaptation contracts
- Progress Reports for Management/Central Euro Program
- Managing Application Scenario's
- QA on Application/Business Chain tests and on Adaptation & Recovery projects
- Design/staffing of the Migration Organisation
- Directing Bussiness Chain & Division Managers
- Managing Analists Team
- Development of  Emergency Scenario & Report Structure
- Managing Euro Migration
profile_positions.title: Project Architect, Project Manager, Migration Manager, QA Manager

profile_positions.description:
A large Social Security Related Company was running a Y2K program to assure Millennium Compliancy of all their applications. 

Activities:
- Problem and Domain analysis
- Development of a workflowmodel for the Cobol applications (80+)
- Creating a solution strategy for Non-Cobol applications (120+)
- Development of a strategy for regression testing
- Development of a strategy for Time-travel testing
- Development of a control- and conversion strategy
- Selection and training of project members
- Development of a workflowmodel for the Non-Cobol conversion factory
- Writing and implementing the projectplan for the Non-Cobol project
- Developing and managing the master planning
- Project management of the Non-Cobol Project
- Management of the Non-Cobol Conversion Factory
- Managing technically complex or politically sensitive application chains
- Generic troubleshooter
profile_positions.title: Project leader/Visionair

profile_positions.description:
I owned and managed a small company (3 employees max) focused on sales to consumers and small businesses/schools. After a few years, I sold the company to my partner.

- Sale of PC's, accessories and software
- Installation, Migration and Maintenance of Computer Networks (Novell, Microsoft)
- Courses in Office Software
profile_positions.title: Owner
